forum.name: bugs and glitches
forum.description: post bugs and glitches you find here
forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: voice commands will not register

comments.text: i've taken all the nessicary steps but when hears does not work at all. it used to work just fine but recently stopped picking up what im saying
voice commands stopped working yesterday for me as well.
wonder if there was any windows update?
i had changed my language and region setting yesterday, today i noticed that tts was also broken but with some more messing with language and region settings ive got it working
again. ive posted about it on the steam forum and done some tests on my other computer, i managed to break tts but not voice recog, details on steam forum.
found a cause for this on my end, if you arent using the microphone set as default then they wont register

thread.latestCommentText: found a cause for this on my end, if you arent using the microphone set as default then they wont register
